title: VK API JSON Schema - methods
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - methods

methods.name: market.add
methods.description: Ads a new item to the market.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Url for button in market item.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

methods.name: market.addToAlbum
methods.description: Adds an item to one or multiple collections.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: album_ids
parameters.description: Collections IDs to add item to.

methods.name: market.createComment
methods.description: Creates a new comment for an item.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Comment text (required if 'attachments' parameter is not specified)

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of objects attached to a comment. The field is submitted the following way: , "'<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>'", , '' - media attachment type: "'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document", , '<owner_id>' - media owner id, '<media_id>' - media attachment id, , For example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614",

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: '1' - comment will be published on behalf of a community, '0' - on behalf of a user (by default).

parameters.name: reply_to_comment
parameters.description: ID of a comment to reply with current comment to.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Random value to avoid resending one comment.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an collection owner community.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: identifier of an item owner community, "Note that community id in the 'owner_id' parameter should be negative number. For example 'owner_id'=-1 matches the [vk.com/apiclub|VK API] community "

response.description: Returns 1 if request has been processed successfully (0 if the comment is not found)

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Url for button in market item.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an collection owner community.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: New comment text (required if 'attachments' are not specified), , 2048 symbols maximum.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of objects attached to a comment. The field is submitted the following way: , "'<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>'", , '' - media attachment type: "'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document", , '<owner_id>' - media owner id, '<media_id>' - media attachment id, , For example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614",

methods.name: market.filterCategories
methods.description: Returns a filter list of market categories.

methods.name: market.get
methods.description: Returns items list for a community.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community, "Note that community id in the 'owner_id' parameter should be negative number. For example 'owner_id'=-1 matches the [vk.com/apiclub|VK API] community "

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - method will return additional fields: 'likes, can_comment, car_repost, photos'. These parameters are not returned by default.

parameters.name: need_variants
parameters.description: Add variants to response if exist

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: identifier of an album owner community, "Note that community id in the 'owner_id' parameter should be negative number. For example 'owner_id'=-1 matches the [vk.com/apiclub|VK API] community "

parameters.name: album_ids
parameters.description: collections identifiers to obtain data from

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an items owner community.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

methods.name: market.getById
methods.description: Returns information about market items by their ids.

parameters.name: item_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated ids list: {user id}_{item id}. If an item belongs to a community -{community id} is used. " 'Videos' value example: , '-4363_136089719,13245770_137352259'"

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return additional fields: 'likes, can_comment, car_repost, photos'. By default: '0'.

methods.name: market.getCategories
methods.description: Returns a list of market categories.

methods.name: market.getComments
methods.description: Returns comments list for an item.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community

parameters.name: start_comment_id
parameters.description: ID of a comment to start a list from (details below).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order ('asc' - from old to new, 'desc' - from new to old)

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - comments will be returned as numbered objects, in addition lists of 'profiles' and 'groups' objects will be returned.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of additional profile fields to return. See the [vk.com/dev/fields|details]

methods.name: market.getOrderItems
methods.description: Get market items in the order

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Orders status updated date from (format: yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Orders status updated date to (format: yyyy-mm-dd)

methods.name: market.getProductPhotoUploadServer
methods.description: Returns the server address for market photo upload.

methods.name: market.removeFromAlbum
methods.description: Removes an item from one or multiple collections.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: album_ids
parameters.description: Collections IDs to remove item from.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: ID of a collection to place current collection before it.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: ID of a collection to place current collection after it.

methods.name: market.reorderItems
methods.description: Changes item place in a collection.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: ID of a collection to reorder items in. Set 0 to reorder full items list.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: ID of an item to place current item before it.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: ID of an item to place current item after it.

methods.name: market.report
methods.description: Sends a complaint to the item.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Complaint reason. Possible values: *'0' - spam,, *'1' - child porn,, *'2' - extremism,, *'3' - violence,, *'4' - drugs propaganda,, *'5' - adult materials,, *'6' - insult.

methods.name: market.reportComment
methods.description: Sends a complaint to the item's comment.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Complaint reason. Possible values: *'0' - spam,, *'1' - child porn,, *'2' - extremism,, *'3' - violence,, *'4' - drugs propaganda,, *'5' - adult materials,, *'6' - insult.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an item owner community.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: identifier of an item owner community, "Note that community id in the 'owner_id' parameter should be negative number. For example 'owner_id'=-1 matches the [vk.com/apiclub|VK API] community "

response.description: Returns 1 if request has been processed successfully (0 if the comment is not found)

methods.name: market.search
methods.description: Searches market items in a community's catalog

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of an items owner community.

parameters.name: rev
parameters.description: '0' - do not use reverse order, '1' - use reverse order

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return additional fields: 'likes, can_comment, car_repost, photos'. By default: '0'.

parameters.name: need_variants
parameters.description: Add variants to response if exist
